p: The DK EE of spray-dried powders ranged from 4.4% ± 0.24% to 88.9% ± 0.42% and was the highest when wall material contained beta-cyclodextrin (30%) and the lowest when resistant-maltodextrin (10%) was used ( Figure 6). The EE of DK decreases with increasing concentration (10% > 20% > 30%) of wall material in liquid feed solution for spray-drying: skim milk 26.64%, 25.51%, 25.27%, maltodextrin 12.91%, 7.13%, (10% of wall material didn’t encapsulate DK), respectively.
